document.full_text: real madrid put a replica of the copa del rey trophy on display at its stadium after the original was crushed under the team bus amid the celebrations of its 1-0 final victory over barcelona.
document.title: madrid gets replica after cup flattened by bus
lines_and_colors: real madrid put a replica of the copa del rey trophy on display at its stadium after the original was crushed under the team bus amid the celebrations of its 1-0 final victory over barcelona.
